meanings.definition: A traditional Mexican dish made of masa dough filled with meat, cheese, or other ingredients, wrapped in a corn husk and steamed.
meanings.sent1: My abuela makes the best tamal for special occasions.
meanings.sent2: I bought a tamal from the food truck for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The tamal told a joke to the enchilada, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The tamal was a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the tamal filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A single serving of the dish tamal.
meanings.sent1: I ate a delicious tamal for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: She ordered two tamales to-go from the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The tamal rolled off the plate and onto the floor, causing a mess.
meanings.sent4: His smile was as comforting as a tamal on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The tamal was the star of the potluck, disappearing quickly.
